description: Normalized volume of center slice of n-dimensional cube: 2^n * n! * Vol({ x\in [ 0,1 ]: sum_{i=1}^n n/2 <= x_i <= (n+1)/2 }).
formula: V(d) = sum_{k=1}^{d-1} {d choose k-1} A_{d, k} where A_{k, d} denotes the Eulerian number (permutations of a d-set with k-1 descents) - see A008292.Restated: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} C(n,k-1)*A008292(n,k) for n>=1.
author: Guenter M. Ziegler (ziegler(AT)math.tu-berlin.de)
extensions: More terms from Paul Hanna, Mar 15 2006
